volunteer_experience.info: Responsibilities as a member of Kharagpur Open Source Society are - To promote Open Source among all the students of IIT Kharagpur - To organize workshops and hands-on sessions e.g. git, Python, Android, etc. - To promote Unix and help students use it for development - To organize seminars for Open Source programs like Google Summer of Code and increase the student participation
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Kharagpur Open Source Society
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer and Executive

volunteer_experience.info: Metakgp is the community wiki of IIT Kharagpur. Link -  happen to be one of the top 5 contributors to the wiki.

volunteer_experience.title: Editor

volunteer_experience.info:
I joined TLS as an English team writer in my first year at college. Societies under Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur generally have four Governors for an academic session and all Senior Editors coordinate the team. In my third year, I was elected as one of them.Responsibilities throughout the year are- Publishing Alankar, the Annual magazine of Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur- Holding selections for freshers in the campus- Organizing weekly meetings to discuss upcoming event andâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I joined TLS as an English team writer in my first year at college. Societies under Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur generally have four Governors for an academic session and all Senior Editors coordinate the team. In my third year, I was elected as one of them.Responsibilities throughout the year are- Publishing Alankar, the Annual magazine of Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur- Holding selections for freshers in the campus- Organizing weekly meetings to discuss upcoming event and publications- Publishing biweekly english magazine, Coffeetalks- Organizing the third edition of Kavya Sandhya, an evening for Hindi poetry recitation- Representing IIT Kharagpur in literary events in Inter IIT Cultural Meet held in December 2016 at IIT Bombay- Leading 71 member team of UG, PG and PhD students and serving 10,000+ readers with literary contents
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Technology Literary Society, IIT Kharagpur
volunteer_experience.title: Writer, Governor and Senior Editor

projects.title: Potterscript
projects.description: A language similar to Muggle's Python

projects.title: Plot2Table
projects.description: This software could detect plots from pdf scans of research papers and create a table of the data points corresponding to the various curves on the graphs.We won Silver medal in Inter-Hall event Open Soft at IIT Kharagpur.

projects.title: Smart Ways
projects.description: A project on Smart City for the course Soft Computing Tools in Engineering by Prof Sudhir Kumar BaraiWe used Neural Networks to solve the traffic problem in Indian cities by suggesting the possibilities of one way routes.Presentation : https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1eM7K93favAPCghnJD5uw5DR3dagAWKZ_qK1f0vjg2U8

projects.title: Depends
projects.description: Analyze the dependencies of a Python project.

projects.title: ping-me
projects.description: A cross-platform application which supports setting reminders from terminal using Natural Language Processing.It supports Linux, macOS, Windows, Chrome and Android.

projects.title: Keep
projects.description: Command Line toolkit to store and retrieve commands.

projects.title: Morse Talk
projects.description: A Python library written for Morse CodeThe project was started in summer 2015 by me, and later on the ownership was transferred to the organization when SÃ©bastien Celles started his contributions to the library. He has done some great work on implementing new features to morse-talk.
